text: Mwenemo mwashinkupagwa shitala sha shaabhu sha tutumishiya lubhani na lishanduku lya malagano, lipashilwe shaabhu mmbali yowe. Nkati lyene lishandukulyo, lyashinkupagwa shibhiga shipashilwe shaabhu shatajilwe mana na ntindisho gwa a Aluni gwa ipuka na ibhao ibhili ya maganga yajandikwe malagano.
